about_the_game:
-Turn-based tactical game, will require you to combine a lot of game moments - an attack card, the position of the hero on the playing field, the morality of the hero - everything matters.
-Immerse yourself in the world of dark and brutal sci-fi.
-Death is not the end. Try again to achieve perfection.
-Unlock new heroes, cards, skills and more.
-Upgrade cards to build what you think is the best deck to destroy the dark emperor.
-An important role is played not only by the deck, but by the place where the card is used - each position gives its own bonus.
-At any time, you can resort to blood sacrifice, but be careful - the bonus from it can bring very painful consequences.
-The morale system will allow you to more successfully use your deck or, on the contrary, will greatly complicate its use.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256Mb+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Cyber ​​souls is a tactics and roguelike deck building game. Choose a hero, unlock new items and cards, create your deck and fight powerful enemies in deep tactical battles. Are you ready to take a risk?
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese
